author: GaNopper

text: I love it how the riffs in a lot of the DKR tracks are sourced from familiar tunes.. this one uses Rudolph the Red Nosed Raindeer, and Everfrost Peak riffs on the Brady Bunch theme song. As one of the top commenters puts it, best non-Japanese game ost. I listen to so much game music in my spare time and this is one of the few western osts in my rotation, others being amazing genesis tracks by the likes of Jesper Kyd and heard in Subterranea and Batman and Robin.

text:
A glorious game, though not a choice I'd go for first.

This game. So great. I think that if the races had more laps, or longer courses, more courses, more items(?), or the AI was harder. . This would be the greatest racing game ever. That's the only reason I won't play anymore. And yet, I couldn't get enough of it in my younger days.
